system.description:
With your magic and your bonded artifact at your disposal, there are few situations you cannot overcome, and in time you may be the one the songs and poems are written about. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, Charisma, or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Half your wielder levels count as bard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6vy9t8q4cq53nw8v]{Bardic Legend} feature.

  • Half your bard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.58m3opb9e064kx2g]{Artifact Incarnate} feature.

  • You gain an additional benefit based on the type of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact} you have:

    • If your Bonded Artifact is an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, you can spend a use of Bardic Inspiration to change its appearance, including making it look like ordinary clothing if you so desire. 

    • If your Bonded Artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, it exerts a subtle influence over your presence. While you are wielding it, your Prestige score counts as 1 higher than it would normally be, and you gain an expertise die on Persuasion checks. Your bonded artifact can also change its shape to that of a musical instrument you are proficient with when you finish a short or long rest. It retains its properties as a font of power in the new form.

    • If your Bonded Artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, it increases your artistry on the battlefield. Choose a maneuver from the Razor’s Edge or Unending Wheel combat traditions of a level you could learn. While you are wielding your Bonded Artifact, you can use that maneuver as if you knew it.
